description:
Wallpaper slideshow is a simple application that lets you select pictures from your phone that you want to be your wallpapers, and it will automatically switch your phones wallpaper to them  randomly or in sequence, however often you choose.


Note: If you use an "appwill" wallpaper app to download wallpapers, some of their wallpaper extensions are incorrect and can cause the image to not work when setting as a wallpaper  in WebOS.
